description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Thessaloniki, Greece. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Thessaloniki 1920s Heritage Escape near Old Town with Rooftop Terrace
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in contemporary luxury at this boutique masterpiece that combines industrial chic with mid-century elegance. Begin your day with specialty coffee and locally-inspired breakfast at The Modernist Cafe, then soak in breathtaking sunset views from the rooftop terrace. Relax in thoughtfully designed spaces where raw concrete meets soft linens and bespoke furniture. The Modernist Thessaloniki sits in the hip Ladadika district, where traditional tavernas rub shoulders with modern art galleries and wine bars. Just steps from the city's coolest haunts and treasures, you're a three-minute wander from the bustling Aristotelous Square, or you can enjoy a leisurely stroll along the waterfront to the iconic White Tower.

hotels.title: Boutique Thessaloniki Luxury with Gourmet Restaurant
hotels.description: Relax into boutique European luxury at The Excelsior Hotel Thessaloniki, where heritage touches meet modern design. Explore the vibrant city that many consider the cultural capital of Greece, blessed with ancient monuments, broad sea views and delectable cuisine. Your carefully renovated boutique hotel boasts beautiful French balconies and stunning marble bathrooms in each room, an in-house restaurant serving Greek and international culinary delights, and plenty of space to get comfortable and relax.

hotels.title: Boutique Stylish Mainland Greece Stay with Buffet Breakfast & Sparkling Sea Views
hotels.description: Where modern comforts combine with rich culture and classic design, ON Residence boasts stylish spaces overlooking the sparkling Thermaikos Gulf, perfect for respite and rejuvenation. Explore the historic beauty of mainland Greece and return back to a luxurious stay complete with delicious cocktails at the sleek and modern Tiger Loop bar, or a bite of delectable Greek fare at the hotel’s famed restaurant; Olympos Naoussa.
